content:
A postdoc position on interplay of higher category theory, homotopy type theory,Â and/or constructive mathematics is available at Chalmers University of Technology.

The application deadline is November 3. The starting date is flexible and the duration is for up to 3 years. If you know of any interested candidates, please spread the word.
Apologies, there was a problem with formatting the link. It is fixed now: https://www.chalmers.se/en/about-chalmers/work-with-us/vacancies/?rmpage=job&rmjob=13267&rmlang=UK
We may be looking for candidates also after the deadline, so please contact me if you are interested.
